body.p:
Glasgow Mch 30 1865
To His Excellency
Tho E Bramlette
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir,

We desire to raise a company in this county under the late act of the Legislature. Capt. Jno. P. Grinstead late of the 9th Ky Infantry is willing to undertake the enterprise, & I take pleasure in saying that he is a suitable person for the position. At present we have a small negro force which will leave soon, & we will be left defencelss. Our court house has been threatened by the guerrillas. I trust therefore that you will at once give authority
to Capt. Grinstead to raise a company in this county for our protection --
Be pleased to let me hear from you at an early day in regard to this matter
Recommending Capt John P. Grinstead, late of 9th Ky. Vol. Inf. as suitable person to raise Co. of Active Militia.
